title: Eve boobs are NOT her face (client bug)
body: Evelynn's boobs may be the center of attention, but in this case it is a bit inconsistent, because of all the other champs the face is centered (exept you consider her boobs as a face. You naughty little Rito-lers...   ;)   [Kappa ofc]).

replies.body: This is a known issue and we're working on a fix. :)
